    Layout: Header Video

    ìµœëŒ€ 1 ë¶„ ì†Œìš”

    This post should display a header with a responsive video, if the theme supports it.

    Settings

    Parameter Required Description
    id Required ID of the video
    provider Required Hosting provider of the video, either youtube or vimeo

    YouTube

    To embed the following YouTube video at url https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-PVofD2A9t8 (long version) or https://youtu.be/-PVofD2A9t8 (short version) into a post or pageâ€™s main content youâ€™d use:

    {% include video id="-PVofD2A9t8" provider="youtube" %}

    To embed it as a video header youâ€™d use the following YAML Front Matter

    header:
  video:
    id: -PVofD2A9t8
    provider: youtube

    Vimeo

    To embed the following Vimeo video at url https://vimeo.com/212731897 into a post or pageâ€™s main content youâ€™d use:

    {% include video id="212731897" provider="vimeo" %}

    To embed it as a video header youâ€™d use the following YAML Front Matter

    header:
  video:
    id: 212731897
    provider: vimeo
